metadata.feature_description: Add new users to the system

steps.action: Navigate to Users panel in PersonaBar
steps.expected: Users panel opens showing user list and Add User button
steps.actual: Users panel displayed with user list and Add User button visible

steps.expected: Create user form opens with all required fields
steps.actual: Form opened with First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Password, Confirm Password fields, Authorized toggle, Random Password toggle, and Save/Cancel buttons

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify ADD_USER permission and button visibility

steps.action: Login as SuperUser (host) and navigate to Users panel
steps.expected: Add User button should be visible for admin/superuser (canAddUser returns true for isAdmin)
steps.actual: Add User button is visible and clickable for SuperUser account, confirming permission check works correctly

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test user creation workflow with valid data

steps.action: Fill create user form with valid data: First Name: Test, Last Name: NewUser, User Name: testnewuser, Email: testnewuser@test.com, Password: Pass123456
steps.expected: Form accepts all input values and password shows 'strong' indicator
steps.actual: All fields populated correctly, password strength indicator shows 'strong'

steps.expected: User is created successfully and appears in user list
steps.actual: Success notification 'User created successfully.' displayed, new user 'Test NewUser' (testnewuser@test.com) appears at top of user list with join date 01/09/2026, total users increased from 17 to 18

steps.action: Open create user form and click Save without entering any data
steps.expected: Validation errors should appear for all required fields
steps.actual: Red error indicators displayed on all required fields: First Name, Last Name, User Name, Email Address, Password, Confirm Password. Form submission prevented.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test validation errors - invalid email format

steps.action: Fill form with valid data except email field which contains 'invalid-email-format' (no @ symbol)
steps.expected: Email field should show validation error for invalid format
steps.actual: Email Address field displays red error indicator, form submission prevented due to invalid email format

observations: The canAddUser permission check correctly allows SuperUser/Admin access to the Add User functionality
Password strength indicator provides real-time feedback showing 'strong' for complex passwords
Form validation is client-side and provides immediate visual feedback with red error indicators
The Authorized toggle defaults to 'On' for new users
Random Password toggle is available to auto-generate passwords instead of manual entry
Send An Email To New User option is available to notify new users of their account creation
